divs: sighting details1. i was standing on the platform of the long island railroad new hyde park station waiting for the 6:01 am train 2. i glanced east over the horizon to watch the crimson dawn when over the southeast horizon the object appeared seemingly from nowhere 3. i have never seen that object or anything remotely similar to it in real life so i did not have any thoughts at all about what it was. 4. object was round, i believe it to be silver when it appeared , the object hovered and then started flashing yellow, orange, green lights -- the whole object was glowing and then it accelerated forward\horizontally swiftly and was gone. 5. disbelief as to what i just saw, i looked around if any of the handful of people on the platform saw what i saw, had this weird goosebump feeling when i realized i just sighted what can only be described as a ufo. 6. it just accelerated and poof it was gone. 7. all of the above happened between 5-10 seconds
